full_text:
DAG/USAO Tour
From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Charisma Edge, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) James
To Petrucci, Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) NYM/Executive Staff (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
Date 2019/08/14 15:04
Subject: Attachments: DAG/USAO Tour TEXT.htm, U.S.Attorney, et al.tour.8.15.pdf
Good afternoon,
Per the attached, representatives of the DAG's Office and the USAO SDNY will be touring SHU, Inmate Epstein's cell (to the extent it does not contaminate the crime scene), and the suicide watch area on 2. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f. (646)836-7665
Page 13516

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C). The email discusses a tour of SHU and Inmate Epstein's cell.
